page.title: 12RECREATION PARKS
page.content: There are three parks in our {Domesday {Project}area.{Vista Park}is the largest.The area is 174,900 square metres and the facilities are 2 cricket pitches, 2 football pitches, 2 rugby pitches, 4 hockey pitches, 1 athletics track, 100 metres track, 1 putting green, 14 tennis courts <10 hard,4 grass>, indoor bowls, archery field, indoor swimming pool and childrens play equipment.A hockey festival is held annually.{Eastcliff is next in size. It is 55751 square metres. The facilities here are 1 football pitch,1 cricket pitch, childrens play equipment, athletics track,long jump,pole vault, shot, discus and javelin.{London Road}is the smallest park,the area is 24595 square metres and it has childrens play equipment. { }
